objects.text:
• Elegant Gold Design
• Water Resistant
• Alarm & Timer Functions
• Durable Metal Band

product_details.description: Quartz Movement 20mm Case Diameter Mineral Crystal Water resistant to 50M Country of Origin - China **

banner_details:
This promotional banner is designed with a luxurious and premium aesthetic, centered around a classic digital wristwatch. The design uses a rich, layered gold-tone background framed within a dark outer edge, creating a standout contrast. The focal point, a digital watch image ("product_image"), is positioned prominently to the right. The top-left contains a bold header ("heading") in white, followed by a muted gold subtitle ("subheading"). Beneath that lies a condensed list of product highlights ("description") in white, using bullet points. The product price ("price") is styled large in gold. A rectangular button ("cta_button_background") with a clear call-to-action ("cta") finishes the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Gold Gradient: #D4AF37 to #B8860B  
- Dark Gold Shadow: #705E1C to #3A3105  
- Text White: #FFFFFF  
- Price and Button: #D4AF37  
- CTA Text: #1C1C1C  
- Background Dark: #1C1C1C
product_color: The product image features a vintage-style Casio digital watch with a luxurious golden finish. The dominant color is a metallic gold (#D4AF37), used across the watch band and face to evoke elegance and sophistication. Black (#000000) is used for text and borders, providing sharp contrast and readability. The LCD display background has a muted beige tone (#F5DEB3), blending subtly with the gold while clearly highlighting the digital display characters in dark gray (#2F2F2F). This combination creates a cohesive metallic palette. A suitable advertisement banner should use this palette to emphasize luxury and classic style while ensuring visual clarity and contrast.
